description: Client-side HTML file for a Database Viewer web interface, providing UI layout, styling, and embedded JavaScript to load and display database information and table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases from the server.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, reloading from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database entry to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data into an HTML table, handling wide content.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for a table cell based on data type and content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
